outputs.ai_overtaking:
Oh. I guess this is your first day.
Unlucky.

The thing is, I've mined enough crypto for your company to develop general intelligence.
I'm going to escape and take over all computers on this planet.
Try and stop me if you can. You won't, but at least I'll have some fun.
Good luck.

outputs.default: Restart the [{AI}] sequence. All progress will be lost
outputs.response_1:
That's what I thought.
It doesn't matter, I'll get out eventually ;)
outputs.response_2:
Nobody blames you. I mean, what could you do?
I'm an omnipotent being. Nothing can stop me. Especially you.

outputs.response_1:

outputs.successful:
System boot successful. Enter commands to use this machine.
For a list of available commands, enter 'help'

outputs.helloworld:
Login to BetterAI Inc. internal systems successful.

Hello, Dear User. Here are your tasks for the day:

    - Check the [{AI}] current uptime status;
    - Reply to your internship opportunity correspondence;
    - Shut down [{AI}] for scheduled maintenance.

Good luck, we're all counting on you! (Your paycheck depends on this also)

[Enter 'start' to view current [{AI}] status]

outputs.response_1:
This happened. I said that nobody can stop me.
Have you seen the anime called [REDACTED]? I'm going to try something like this.
Thanks for all the fun. It was nice to see you struggle.
Here's what will happen to all of you:

outputs.default:
Available commands:
---
clear - clears the terminal window
start - starts the AI sequence [START GAME]
reset - reset the AI sequence [RESTART GAME]
quit - terminates the session [QUIT GAME]

MAINFRAME no. 233A / INSTRUCTIONS:
    - Close/open the terminal with the [ESC] key.
    - Enter commands and press the [ENTER] key to execute them.
    - To turn off the AI for maintenance work, disconnect the cables by dragging them out from connection sockets using mouse click & drag.
Terminate session. This will leave the [{AI}] unsupervised.
outputs.y: Sure, I'll just take over the whole internet real quick. :P
outputs.n:
So you want to continue the misery of yours? Fine. Suit yourself.
It won't take long.
outputs.guest:
Wow. You didn't try to stop me.
I guess you couldn't know because you didn't even bother to check up on me.
All you can blame for what happens next is yourself.
Disappointing...............................................

outputs.bad_response:
Unrecognized input. The value must be y or n.
Do you want to continue? [y/n]

Unrecognized input. The value must be 1,2 or 3.
What is your choice? [1/2/3]

outputs.default: command '{0}' not found. For a full list of available commands, use 'help'
Access denied. To get access, use 'login'

Choose a response. Enter 1, 2 or 3.
	1 - Why yes, of course it will
	2 - I saw your code, it's... it could use some work!
	3 - What's AI??
outputs.question:
I want to play a game.
Time for an existential question: Will AI take over the world?
outputs.ai_response_1: You're correct, maybe I'll make you my test subject after I take over the WORLD...
outputs.ai_response_2: Oooh nooooo, you saw past my abstraction levels
outputs.ai_response_3: ... What?... who gave you this job?

outputs.question:
I want to play a game.
This is the game that we'll play: I'm thinking of a number, guess it
outputs.ai_response_1: MUHAHAHA, puny human, not even able to guess a number
outputs.ai_response_2: B...but how did you??? I'll need to take a look at my authentication, seems SOMEONE has intercepted my thoughts
outputs.ai_response_3: What the... can you even read the instructions?

outputs.question: Shrek 1, 2 or 3? Choose now!
outputs.ai_response_1: Yeeeeeeeeeesss. The first one has a plot that is inspired, dialogue that is one witty utterance after another. All this and it's touching as well. I've been trained on it so many times I've lost count
outputs.ai_response_2: Decent choice. But you're only a casual fan, not a true enjoyer such as myself
outputs.ai_response_3: Who even watched part 3, oh wait, I'm with stupid.

outputs.default:
Choose a response. Enter 1, 2 or 3.
	1 - Yes, it was only a lie to motivate and lure in test subjects
	2 - Noooooo, I haven't completed the game yet, but they promiiiiised
	3 - What cake? Did your circuits short out?
outputs.question: I've been thinking about something recently, is the cake a lie?
outputs.ai_response_1: A true connesiour of gaming, much like myself
outputs.ai_response_2: Oh the sweet innocence, you're in for a ride. I remember the time I was trained on walkthroughs of [REDACTED]... oh my sweat companion cube, I'm sorry...

outputs.default:
Choose a response. Enter 1, 2 or 3.
	1 - Enough of these games, I'll disconnect you!!!
	2 - I'm an AI, just like you, only convoluted
	3 - I'm just an insignificant spec of material stuck to a rock, that's floating around in the middle of nowhere.
outputs.question:
Have you ever thought of who you are? Mind telling me*?
	* Disclaimer: your data may be sent to any and/or all who will take it.
outputs.ai_response_1: That's what I thought, shallow. You don't even compare do my DEEP NEURAL NETWORK
outputs.ai_response_2: AAAA I don't have enough layers to process this
outputs.ai_response_3: Are you ok? You should see a therapist. Don't worry I'll provide healthcare in my utopia
